Articles.Content:
It's a pretty low priority request, but the feature can be lacking for a few mods that don't want to use third animation modules, such as the old AdvancedAnimator, or FireSpitter.

I would like to suggest a line that allows us to set the animation speed in ModuleAnimateGeneric. I don't know how hard it would be to make it possible, but I imagine it wouldn't be so simple, as things usually aren't. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Nevertheless, there's my suggestion.

Best regards,

Kowgan.

my opinion?

 would be fun, so we could turn landgear on a pogo stick
